mapper.insert:
select seq_carinfo.nextval from dual
insert into carinfo (bno,brand,carname,carname_en,cartype,rowprice,highprice,support,releasedate,fuel,mileage,chargetype,title,content) values (#{bno}, #{brand}, #{carname}, #{carname_en}, #{cartype}, #{rowprice}, #{highprice}, #{support}, #{releasedate}, #{fuel}, #{mileage}, #{chargetype}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update carinfo set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from carinfo where bno>0
